snippet: Arriving by bus, subway, car and on foot, about 1.1 million children across the five boroughs filled the city’s 1,700 schools on a cheerful Monday morning.
abstract: Arriving by bus, subway, car and on foot, about 1.1 million children across the five boroughs filled the city’s 1,700 schools on a cheerful Monday morning.

headline.main: On a Bright Morning, New York Students Head Back to School
